Pokoknya puas dsni

text: Hotel ini memberika pelayanan yang sangat baik dimulai dari kedatangan. Sambutan dari security sangat baik. Resepsionis juga ramah dan memberikan sambutan yang baik. Kebersihan hotel dan toilet sangat terjaga.
title: Staycation

text:
First time menginap di Allium Hotel, kesan pertama lobby nya cukup luas dan bersih, All staff is really friendly dari mulai pertama kali check in di handle oleh Pak Irfan pelayanan nya ramah dan cepat jadi saya tidak menunggu lama, lalu check out di bantu oleh Andin,Catrice, dan Natalie juga sangat helpfull. 
Kamar bersih dan ac nya pun dingin.
Overall recommended untuk kalian yang ingin staycation disini

text:
Pertama kali mencoba menginap di Alium Tangerang, dan tidak menyangka pelayananya sangat baik. Kita dari awal masuk sudah diberi pelayanan yang baik dari para staf yang ada. Semua staf disini sangat ramah dan hangat. 
Kamar yang kami tempati juga sangat nyaman dan bersih. Tidak ada keluhan untuk itu semua. Staf disini juga sangat fast respon bila membutuhkan bantuan house keeping atau service room.
Untuk Makanan, Buffet yang disediakan tidak terlalu banyak tetapi cukup enak. Dan satu yang terbaik adalah Cheese Cakenya...sangat Lezat.

Dari keseluruhan..hotel ini sangat nyaman dan cocok dijadikan referensi menginap bagi anda dan keluarga.

title: Review hotel

owner_response.text:
Kepada Ibu Tiara yang terhormat,

Salam hangat dari Hotel Allium Tangerang.

Terima kasih telah membagikan ulasan positif anda tentang Hotel Allium kepada pengunjung Trip Advisor.

Saya senang mengetahui bahwa anda merasa puas dengan fasilitas dan pelayanan yang hotel allium berikan selama anda menginap .

Terimakasih atas kepercayaan yang telah anda berikan dan terimakasih telah memilih Hotel Allium tangerang sebagai tempat menghabiskan waktu di Tangerang.

Lokasi Hotel Allium berada di jalan benteng betawi no 88, Buaran Indah, Kota Tangerang, dekat dengan stasiun KRL dan Railink bandara, dekat dengan terminal bis antar kota antar provinsi terminal poris plawad, dan akses tol bandara (Cengkareng - Buaran Indah), hanya 10 menit dari dan menuju Bandara Soekarno - Hatta, dekat dengan pusat perbelanjaan dan pusat kuliner juga.

Kesehatan dan kebersihan serta kenyamanan para tamu adalah prioritas utama kami, maka karena itu kami berusaha untuk terus memberikan yang terbaik.

Ulasan positif anda telah kami bagikan kepada seluruh tim, terutama Natalia di Front Office Departemen, sebagai motivasi agar selalu memberikan pelayanan yang terbaik.

Informasikan pengalaman seru dan positif anda tentang Hotel Allium Tangerang kepada teman dan keluarga yang lain.

Kami tunggu kembali kedatangan anda di staycation berikutnya.

Jangan ragu untuk menghubungi tim kami yang berdedikasi tinggi di contact@alliumairport.com atau instagram @alliumtangeranghotel dan biarkan kami membantu kunjungan Anda berikutnya.

Salam hormat,

Defi Kardianto
General Manager Allium Hotel

text:
Ini pertama kalinya ke Allium hotel untuk liburan ke rumah neneknya anak-anak di Cipondoh. Kesan dari saya, ini adalah hotel yang terbaik dari sisi pelayanan dan keramahtamahannya. Begitu datang, kita disambut lobi hotel yang mewah, staf hotel yang responsif, yang apapun ditawarkan dan diinformasikan. Terima kasih untuk mbak Yovani dan mas Irfan yang begitu baik. Dari sekian hotel yang pernah kami menginap, baru kali ini saya ditawari mau pakai dua kunci atau tidak. Tentu saja kami pilih dua kunci. Biar kalau kamar ditinggal, AC kamar bisa tetap dinyalakan, dan pas datang kembali kamar tetap adem. 
Kamarnya mungkin tidak jauh berbeda dengan kamar hotel yang lain, tapi nyaman dan bersih. Kamar mandinya bersih, handuk dan sepreinya bersih. 
Makanannya menurut saya juga terbaik. Beragam dan enak. Saya kebetulan ambil menu pas makan sahur. Dan itu juga lagi-lagi diingatkan mbak Yovani pas malamnya. Satu lagi. text:
sudah 2x saya menginap di hotel Allium ini. yang pertama di bulan maret 2017 dan yg kedua  adalah di akhir april 2017.
hotel ini adalah hotel berbintang 4 yang ok sesuai dengan ratingnya.

KELEBIHAN :
- welcome drink di kunjungan pertama. sayangnya di kunjungan kedua tidak ada welcome drink
- variasi makanan bagus dan rasa cukup enak. tempat makan luas, dan mencerminkan kemewahan hotel bintang 4
- hotel terlihat dan terasa bersih dan modern
- kami diberikan free upgrade ke kamar yg lbh besar di kunjungan pertama yg rupanya memang cukup signifikan beda luasnya karena di kunjungan kedua tidak dapat free upgrade dan kamar terasa memang kecil.

KEKURANGAN :
- di kunjungan pertama ada anak kecoa di kamar mandi 
- tidak ada bathtub
- lift ada 2, tetapi selalu hanya 1 yg operasional. dr 2 kunjungan saya lift yang kanan selalu dalam perbaikan. sepertinya memang sengaja tidak dipakai operasional entah mengapa, mgkn utk penghematan. hal ini sangat mengganggu mengingat di kunjungan pertama ada 2 pernikahan di hotel ini yang terjadi bersamaan di hari itu sehingga lift sangat penuh baik untuk tamu pernikahan maupun untuk mempelai dan keluarganya yang naik turun menumpuk di 1 lift sehingga sangat lama menunggu giliran bisa masuk ke lift yang selalu penuh
- parkir yang kurang ditata.pada kunjungan kedua, ketika mau pulang, kami tidak bisa mengeluarkan mobil karena tertutup mobil yang parkir paralel di depan kami. padahal seharusnya jika memang tempat tidak cukup, kan masih ada parkir basement, tetapi satpam mengijinkan mobil tersebut (yang parkir belakangan) untuk paralel di depan mobil kami.alhasil kami harus menunggu dipanggilkan orangnya sekitar 15-20 menit padahal kami sedang buru-buru ada janji di tempat lain.
- ini sih trivial (sebenarnya tidak masalah hanya harapan saya yg terlalu tinggi), tetapi sayangnya untuk restoran bintang 4,chef nya tidak tau "egg benedict" sehingga tidak bisa membuatkan permintaan saya.
- checkout yg lama utk pengecekan dan resepsionis yang berkali2 lupa dan harus diingatkan hingga 3x untuk mengembalikan uang deposit saya

text:
*Lokasi: tengah Kota Tangerang, 15-20 menit dari Bandara Soekarno Hatta.
*Jemput, antar dari dan ke bandara: sangat bagus, setiap saat (24 jam).
*Kamar dan suasana hotel: bintang 5. Cocok utk bisnis maupun berlibur dg keluarga.
*Fasilitas meeting, beberapa ruangan dg berbagai ukuran, disertai kelengkapan meeting yg sangat memadai.
*Breakfast: selalu berganti menu setiap hari, dg cita rasa yg istimewa.
*Sarana olahraga: renang dan gym, tersedia fasilitas yg bagus dan menyenangkan.
*Staf Hotel: ramah, kekeluargaan sepanjang waktu.
---Mendarat di Bandara Soekarno-Hatta, hanya 1 tujuan, Allium Tangerang Hotel---

text:
Pelayanan disini bisa dikatakan seperti pelayanan bintang 5. Mulai dari security, receptionist, housekeeping, dll yang tidak bisa disebutkan satu per satu. Semuanya seperti berlomba-lomba untuk memberikan pelayanan terbaik yang tidak terlupakan bagi pengunjung hotel.
Kamarnya lumayan luas dengan tempat tidur tipe King. Kamar mandinya shower, dilengkapi fasilitas air panas yang berfungsi.
Kolam renangnya sih bisa dibilang kecil. Cocok untuk berpergian membawa keluarga yang masih punya anak kecil. Fasilitas gym nya lumayan, walupun sungguh minimalis karena alat-alatnya tidaklah lengkap.
Untuk menu sarapan pagi, benar-benar tidak mengecewakan. Rasanya bener-bener enak! Enak! Menunya juga bervariasi, ada menu brunch juga. Semakin menambah variasi menu disini.

text: Dari luar hotel kelihatan sedikit tua dan pada mulanya saya berpikir ini hotel berbintang 3.  Lobinya mewah dan stafnya ramah.  Kayaknya hotel ini telah direnovasi karena kamar dan kafe seperti baru.  Ada kolam renang di luar, dekat lobi, dan gym yang kecil.  Makan malan dan sarapan pagi termasuk dalam harga yang saya bayar - dua-duanya gaya buffet dan makanan sederhana tapi enak.  Saya suka hotel ini, kecuali ia terletak di daerah yang agak jauh dari bandara.  Ada shuttle tapi hanya setiap 2 atau 3 jam, jadi saya naik taksi (IDR100.000; 40 menit).  Wifi kurang nyaman karena sinyalnya lemah sekali.  Tapi harga terjangkau, jadi mudah-mudahan saya akan menginap di sini pada masa depan.

text:
We had a wonderful experience here at Allium! We had stopped here on our way to Borobudur, and had spent a wonderful 24 hours! From CGK airport, the hotel is only 45 minutes by taxi or they offer pickup/drop off throughout the day.

We were greeted by the most gracious staff, the room was pristine, room service quick, breakfast and lunch dining exceed far beyond expectations. Chef Hero and Kiki were extremely accommodatable during our stay making the experience all that much better. Definitely would recommend and stay again.
title: Gracious hospitality, beautiful rooms, and delicious dining

owner_response.text:
Dear Allium Tangerang Hotel Guest, 

Greetings from the City of Tangerang and thank you for staying with us recently, the team and I are very glad to receive your valuable comments and we would like to thank you as well for your time into posting your review, our guests' perspective is important to us and so is your constructive feedback.

In particular we have noted your positive comments about our service, cleanliness and the good food. photos.caption: Main Course : Vegiterian Lasagna & Rice and Vegetables

text:
My friend and I spent one night at the Allium Tangerang Hotel during a layover. It was exactly what we needed. The airport shuttle pickup service was great since navigating the city can be tough. The service was excellent and the rooms were modern and had very comfy beds! 

We loved having a gym on site to do a small workout and a pool to take a dip to cool off afterwords.

I am vegan and my friend is vegetarian which can be difficult to explain in new countries. The executive chef, Hero, was very accommodating and made sure there was food we were able to enjoy in the morning breakfast buffet (excellent by the way!). He also made sure that there were lunch and dinner options to suit our dietary restrictions. Thank you Hero and Kiki!!

Overall, we loved our stay with Allium and will hopefully be back soon! The best place near the airport to spend a layover!
title: We LOVE the Allium Hotel!

A very annoying moment has to wait for the promised hotel pickup from Soekarno Hatta airport to this hotel. I had time to argue with the allium hotel manager about the last pickup so I had to pay more for the taxi.
But thank goodness the hotel was responsible for compensation for paying my taxi bill even upgrading my hotel room to the executive.

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: I stayed in Allium Tangerang on 03/10/17 - 03/12/17.  During that stay, only one elevator works properly (there were 2, but one out of order).  According to the front desk it's been for sometimes with that condition.  Unfortunately they didn't anticipate two wedding parties took place at the same time on 03/11/17.  I stayed in room 312, third floor. Due to the overflowing crowd at the elevator, I have to wait for about 25 minutes just to return to my room after breakfast.  I was about to take the stairway instead of elevator, however surprisingly the security officer told me that the stairway cannot be accessed (stuck) because the door is broken (??) and therefore it is not accessible.  As far as I know, emergency exit should be accessible in awareness of sudden incident (fire, etc).  Allium Tangerang should pay attention to this small but significant matter.  It is too risky to let the emergency door not accessible.
title: Safety Issue

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Junas,

Warmest Greetings from Allium Tangerang Hotel,

Thank you for your trust in choosing Allium Tangerang Hotel as your accommodation during your visit to Tangerang. We also thanked for your time reviewing our hotel. Guest safety and satisfaction are our concerns and we apologize for the inconvenience happened related to our elevator. 

Allow us to explain, it was true one of our elevators was under maintenance and we had been waiting for spare part which is imported from abroad, during the period we allow guests using our service elevators especially during the wedding event. Stairway always works properly well however as emergency door which is heavily made, it requires hard push likely other emergency doors.

Again thank you very much for your valuable opinion and suggestion, we have taken these points seriously for our definite improvement. We are ready to welcome you back to Allium Tangerang Hotel in precise better situation and services.


Sincerely Yours,


Hendra Kurniawan
General Manager

text:
My experience of the Allium hotel was excellent. 

Staff were very friendly and welcoming, I stayed in a standard King-size room which was clean and modern. Had all the amenities you could need (speedy wifi, kettle, toothbrush, good shower...) and the bed was very comfy.

Travel time from the airport is around 45mins -1 hour, but the shuttle service Allium offer is very efficient. Had a chauffeur my name waiting at the taxi rank as I left the airport, just make sure you email allium in advance to book the shuttle service before you land at the airport. 

As I arrived late I ordered room service which was very affordable and arrived well within an hour. 

I was even given a breakfast snack and drink to go as I left the hotel which was a nice touch.

Overall a great nights stay and just what I needed before my long flight home.
title: Superb Hotel and Customer Service. Little touches go a long way...

We also got a free airport shuttle, even though this was outside the normal schedule for shuttles. We stored our luggage at the hotel as we did some final city sightseeing, and the staff also suggested for us to take a train to the city centre and explained how to get there, which was no problem.

text:
Great people who will help you as much as they can. Big shout out to Martin for helping grab a taxi to the Italian Embassy.

Room was nice and comfy bed, shower was also great.

Chef cooks an amazing Auzzie streak, and the food is very good.

Breakfast not so good for International visitors, but very good for locals.

One big issue that I found was the pool and not having a bar.

The Pool is stones throw away from the drop off point near the lobby, and there is no bar and no alcohol. 

This is not the hotel's fault, but the local government. If they do not sort this issue out,  people staying in Tangerang for International business will stop doing so! 

Great hotel, fantastic staff and a nice hotel. But stay out of Tangerang if you want to unwind with a beer after a hard days work, as there are no bars, pubs, shops etc that sell alcohol.
title: Good hotel with nice staff, NO BAR!!!

text:
This hotel is located in the heart of Tangerang. The surrounding is quiet, eventhough near a big street (Jalan Benteng Betawi). We also can find some local culinary spots around it.
The lobby is the highlight, with remarkable wall and unique high ceiling.I think it's excellent architecture. We wait around 15 minutes before we get to our room, maybe because it's high season. But the staff is helpful.
The room is clean and comfy, the bathroom is also clean. No complain about anything about the room. We stayed in deluxe room, and from my window I can overlook the city of Tangerang. As we stayed in New Year's Eve, the view at night was splendid, since we could see the fireworks clearly.
The breakfast is great, many varieties, and the taste is good. My only disappointment would be the peking duck, because it's sold out very fast. I think they didn't have enough ducks. Finally, we just got chicken instead.
Another disappointment is the pool. It's too small. Even my kid couldn't go inside, because it's too crowded. It's like a private pool in the villa, only fit for 5 people inside. Too bad.
Inspite, I enjoy being here. I hope they'll improve their quality of service and the pool :)
title: Another new trendy hotel in Tangerang

text:
I stayed here overnight, since me and my husband were coming from Bali and had an international flight early next day. It was a perfect option since it was close to the airport (about 20 min), and we avoided the chaos of downtown Jakarta. 
The hotel is incredibly nice, clean and modern for the price we pay. We were truly surprised!. Our room was simple, but very clean and modern. The front desk service was very good, and since we had a very early flight, even before the restaurant opened, they offered to make us coffee and give us a pastry before we headed out.
If you are planing to stay close to the airport, and even for a long layover, i would surely recommend you stay here.
title: Perfect place for overnight stay

text:
I have a meeting in Tangerang area and given the travel time in Jakarta (for those who travel there regularly, you would know what the traffic situation), Allium was the best choice.  

Was quite happy with my choice as it is a new hotel and the service is pretty decent.  The cafe is a very modern design - airy and allows natural light to flow into the dining area.  It is one of the better design hotel cafes that I have stayed in Jakarta.  The room are comfortable no complains there either.  

Only minus side is the surrounding area is not for the usual tourist travellers.  There are no amenities or shopping area within walking distance.  The closest convenience stall (Indomaret) is a 10 min walk on foot away.  Good for a short business stay for meetings in Tangerang area but not advisable if you have meetings in Jakarta CBD area.  The travel time is too long.
title: Great Hotel @ Tangerang ; Distance away from Jakarta CBD

text:
I stayed in this hotel after a long flight from Amsterdam. I have to transit for a night before take another flight the next day. The airport pick-up and transfer service is very helpful, because as other reviewers said, this is not a real "airport hotel." The car will take you to the hotel passing narrow and busy streets and crowded neighborhood. It shows you the not-so-nice part of Tangerang city. For people who come to Jakarta for the first time, probably this will be a shocking experience, because the driver has to maneuver the car in such a way to pass the traffic. This is normal if you drive in Jakarta, but if you want to have a pleasant trip to the hotel after a long and tiring flight, you better book other hotels located near the toll road outside airport main gate. This hotel located in the middle of nowhere. I can't find a nice shopping mall or good restaurant in walking distance.

Having said that, the hotel have a comfortable bedroom. It is clean and they have a cozy restaurant. The swimming pool looks great in the website picture but not that great in reality. The breakfast is OK. The most important thing is I have a good night sleep and felt fresh the next morning and ready to continue my trip. 

Overal the hotel is good and gives you a comfortable stay. However, it is not in a good location. This makes your trip from/to the hotel (that can be more than 30 minutes) not pleasant.
title: Comfortable but the location is not that great

text: Price of the hotel is good for what you receive. We had a corner top room with an excellent view (could even see downtown Jakarta in the distance). As many have mentioned, it is not that "close" to the hotel and with Jakarta (Tangerang to be more specific), it could easily take up to an hour to get to the airport. The breakfast is top notch, offering both Indonesian and Western food. It is hard to believe that such a hearty complete meal is included in the cost of the room. Staff overall was quite attentive to our needs. Bellmen always helped us with cab drivers to get to the various malls in the area and told us what would be the expected fare. I have stayed at FM7 resort hotel (another airport hotel in Jakarta) in the past and overall, I do like this hotel better. However, there were some advantages to FM7, like having the spa on the hotel grounds. FM7 also offered transportation to and from the airport at all times of the day. At Allium, the situation seems a little different. They will pick you up from the airport at anytime, if you make arrangements. However, in order to get back to the airport from the hotel , they have a set schedule, which does not run for several hours in the afternoon. Make sure you understand their shuttle schedule before booking a room. We almost became very disappointed with the hotel when we did not realize there was a set schedule (not posted anywhere highly visible) back to the airport. Thank you to Juni on their staff for straightening everything out. She provided us with excellent service both before and during the trip.  She communicated with me via email before the trip and I met her in person while we were there.
title: "Airport" hotel in Jakarta is modern, stylish & clean. Excellent value!

text: We needed an overnight hotel for an extended layover in Jakarta.  I am kind of confused as to why the hotel calls itself an airport hotel when they are not anywhere near the airport - allow at least 40 mins to get to the airport in the morning.  The directions for the pick up were clear, but also confusing because they did not want to pick us up from the arrivals level and it took nearly 40 mins to connect with the driver.  And then when we finally did he drove like a crazy person - veering into the motorcycle lane, flashing lights, stopping on top of the person in front of him.  But we arrived in one piece.  The hotel was clean, and we got very affordable room service for dinner.  We were out again the next morning and the shuttle driver was a tad more sedate.  (Jakarta driving rules still remain a bit of a mystery though).  This worked for what we needed it to do, but I wouldnt use this hotel for more than a brief stay - it doesnt seem to be near anything - including the airport!

text: Where to start? Appreciating this very much beforehand, we were picked up at the airport by the hotel shuttle. Well, picked up... We waited an hour for the driver to come to the pick up point as explained to us by the hotel (a clearly indicated meeting point in front of the Air Asia counter in terminal 3, couldn't be any clearer). Because we were waiting so long we walked around the terminal multiple times, both inside and outside, while calling with the hotel, that kept saying the driver was already there. Finally we found him, and unfortunately he seemed not amused, and said: "Air Asia counter, mister and misses", pointing at some vague Air Asia poster hanging outside while blaming us we didn't find him there. Not so good first impressing, but okay. Then we had a horrific ride of about 20 minutes (normally it should take 35 minutes to get from the airport to hotel), because the driver was speeding to 100 km/hour while traffic was heavy, flashing his lights constantly, ignoring red traffic lights, switching from the left to the right lane, constantly too close behind other cars, almost hitting some of them and numerous motorbikes about a 100 times, hitting the brakes heavily, and seriously endangering himself, us, other car drivers and especially motorbike drivers. It was a terrifying experience, getting swung from left to right in the car. Then we arrived at the hotel, feeling very nauseous, thankful to still be alive, and shaking like a leaf, finding out our room was on the busy street's side with a lot of traffic noise (if for some unexplainable reason you do decide to stay here, get a room on the back side). With some hassle we got a new room on the back side, but with a very dirty toilet, the evidence of other people having used it before clearly there ;) And this is after a long and exhausting travels, when all we wanted was a good shower and a good night's sleep. Only after housekeeping left after cleaning the toilet on our request, we found out the sink, mirror and actually the floor of the entire room were dirty too. We were expecting a good experience after reading most of the latest reviews, but this is just terrible. We were planning beforehand on extending our stay, because our flight doesn't leave until 8 pm, but there's no way we'll be paying to stay any minute longer after what we've experienced. We'll spend the rest of our day tomorrow in a different hotel, hopefully saver, cleaner and closer to the airport. I wouldn't advice anyone to stay here.
title: Terrible!

text:
At first this hotel kinda far from nearest Airport, if they mean the Soekarno Hattta International Airport, in normal traffic it will took an hour at least to reach it from airport. I'm not sure why the name is Airport Hotel. The location itself is at front of big housing complex, and surrounded by shophouses. And the hotel is not really big one, perhaps a bit small for 4 star grade hotel, but the building is the tallest at the area. 

But the pricing and value easily forgive the location (and the name). The price I pay is 2/3 of the usual four star at the Areas, and when I do the check in the front desk kindly give me free upgrade to Executive Deluxe! Even i do a late check in at night, It's a real a big wow, I just ask joking can she give me the quitest room possible?. And she tell me what about at the corner, beside emergency stair?. I instantly say why not. And when reach the room it's the Executive deluxe at 9th floor with the impressive 180^ view, because of one floor to ceiling edge to edge window, and another huge window, the view is stellar especially at the morning, too bad the outer side of window is kinda dirty due to weather I guess. 

The room itself is big, everything work properly, the bed is kinda hard not usual plush type but I love hard one. The cleanliness is top notch, perhaps because this is the Executive Deluxe so not many guest stay here?. The bathroom is big, too bad no bath tub but they replace it with a big shower room with nice rain shower style shower head also the hot water is really hot and avaliable every time. 

The sleep quality is good, the linen is comfort and clean, pillow is plush enough but the central aircon is really noisy, you'll notice it when you Off it after use for a while, even I try to select the lowest fan setting. Also the aircon temperature control a bit weird, the temperature somehow can gradually go up itself, and the fan direction is blow righ to the bed. The room noise is minimum, but there's a lot of weird mechanical noises come from the bathroom and sometimes behind the ceiling, i guess it's the water supply and the aircon system. External noise is well reduced, even you'll not notice a lot that across the hotel is railway station and the road traffic is busy. Too bad the internal noise ruin the sleep quality. Luckily no room next door noisy or room above you noise except sometimes there are door banging noise because the door lock system is not soft close one. 

Breakfast is not as I expected, not much variety and choices, however I can see they try to properly fulfill usual guests needed, from typical and standard Indonesian breakfast to standard and usual international breakfast, and even some choices for vegetarian. The taste is not top notch, but at least they got omelette station (and weirdly placing it outside at their outdoor night bar section), and the cuttleries are clean and neat. I favourite their bread section, the provided plain bread and croissants are good with 4 choices of jam. The Indonesian section got a not bad choices but the taste is a bit off. 

I canceled the usage of pool, because when I reach it, the place it's a bit weird, usually a pool is place in middle floor of building, but they place it outside and maybe it's not open yet or lack of man power, when I arrive the water is a bit cloudy and some visible dirt from trees floating above water. Maybe because of the big holiday so they lack of man power to clean it. The pool itself got 2 section, smaller one for kids, and bigger one for adult, next to two storey building for fitness center above it and first floor for shower room. 

Due to big holiday date, during my stays this hotel surely lack of man power, when I arrive there's no bell boy, and really hard to asking something to housekeeping because they are to busy due to big holiday. I.e. at first I dial the housekeeping number using the in-room telephone, no one pick it up, dial the front desk and they said somehow it's broke. I ask the front desk to deliver dental kit and slipper because it's only available one, and took an hour to arrived, and funnily they also deliver extra soap and shampoo. Nex morning I try dial the housekeeping to pick up laundry, and no one pick it up, so I bring it to front desk and ask them to do the laundry, and at night I dial the housekeeping again no pickup, dial the front desk and took a few moment to deliver it. 

Another minus is the lack of parking space, especially when they got a big event, the basement parking only having a dozens car spaces. And the lobby door quite small, and beside it there's a hall entrance, so it will crowded if big event gathered.  Also only two slow lift available. 

The security is top, and kindly provide you two card for entrance, the elevator can reach to your floor if you tap the card to the reader, and the room door lock is using same key. The provided small safety box also working well. Wifi is provided by default at the same time you check in, and it's free with a decent speed about 3 Mbps download speed peak, the range is covering entire hotel are.
title: Good value one.

text:
I just stayed at the hotel in May, 2015. To be honest, my girlfriend went online to find a hotel close to the airport for our next day's flight. We didn't expect much more.

The hotel turned out to be a lovely experience. The room was very nice and clean. The breakfast was full of choices in a beautiful room with really nice wood decoration & set-up. The staff was very friendly and smiley.

We were told by the staff that any guest staying at the hotel is entitled to a free airport transfer, and we did have one. But what surprised us the most was that me and my girlfriend was given a free private 7 seater car to the airport (the drive is around 35 minutes or so). Not to mention the room rate was very, very affordable comparing to any same level hotel in town.

All was a great experience. I recommend you dealing directly with the hotel so that you can have airport transfer arranged both ways.

I will stay here again next time I come back.

Any complaint I have? Just one: The hotel is alcohol free. I could not ask for a beer nor look for a beer anywhere close to the hotel. So if you drink, do get yourself some beers and put in the fridge.

All the very best to the hotel staff. Wishing you more clients in the near future.
title: Lovely experience

text:
OK, the first thing you need to know is that this hotel is in Tangerang.  You've surely read that Jakarta traffic is a nightmare, and Tangerang is a suburb with its own serious traffic problems.  Unlike a lot of better known airport hotels, four out of four taxi drivers I had in Jakarta had one hell of a time finding this place, even with an address and phone number.  Tangerang traffic is difficult to manage, particularly when coming to and from the airport.  At 4am it took me more than 40 minutes to get from the door of the hotel to the international terminal--with minimal traffic, just because of the circuitous route it takes to get around Tangerang.

While the lobby and restaurant/bar/cafe are cathedral spacious and modern, everything is clean and the staff is friendly, the rooms are completely soulless and lacking any design or much decor and character.  White walls abound.  If you are just passing through, its no big deal, but there must be other options out there that are better than this.

If I had reason to specifically be in Tangerang (as opposed to getting to the airport), I suppose this hotel would be OK.  If I wanted to stay near the airport, I'd pick another hotel that had a big name or was obviously located that any local driver is going to know...or better yet, I would just stay in Jakarta proper and budget my time.
title: Airport Hotel?

text:
I've a frequent at this hotel, business friendly, free WiFi, lovely shower, clean toilets.  

Food at Paris Lyon is amazing aswell.  Customer service is by far the best of any hotels around this area as I've frequented quite a few in and around the airport.
title: Great hotel

text:
In terms of location, this is a quite good hotel, between half an hour and 45min drive to/from the airport, depending on th traffic.
The rooms are spacious and comfortable. The bathroom clear, clean and bright.
The service is good even if a bit forgetful. When I booked the room, I also inquired for the airport shuttle but I had to remember it all on arrival.
There's a bit of everything for breakfast.
Globally, they have a very good photographer because the pool and the building look far much better on booking.com, for example, than in real.
But the real downside of this hotel is that it cannot sell alcohol! Even a cold beer! Wich means we had to take a taxi to the Novotel where we could enjoy a great meal and refreshments.
The hotel,is alright but I would choose another one next time. Tangarang being alcohol free.
title: No drinks today...

text:
I stayed here on route through SEAsia for 2 nights with the sole purpose of visiting Krakatau. I arrived into Jakarta airport at 1pm and It took 25 minutes to get to the hotel. Hotel pick up was there to meet me, I'm surprised he waited as I was very overdue the arrival time, immigration! However, I left at 9am to get back to the airport for an 11.20am flight and it took nearly 2 hours. Reception told me 30 minutes to airport so I didn't take the free shuttle at 8am, which is clearly a better option when negotiating the early morning traffic in Jakarta. Incidentally Air Garuda were super efficient at getting me on the flight.

That said, the hotel is a good option if visiting Krakatau as it is situated on the outskirts of Jakarta which means when returning from the trip it takes 3 1/2 hours and not 5 hours if you go for a hotel in the city.

As a 4* hotel I would say it is up to standard, very comfortable rooms/bed, quiet air con, immaculate rooms, very friendly bar/restaurant/reception staff, they couldn't do enough to help me, no problem with anyone understanding me. When I had a problem with the safe someone was at the room within 3 minutes, the same speed applied to room service.
The food was excellent and price wise equivalent to UK pub price. Do note you cannot get wine or spirits at the hotel so you may want to bring your own duty free. The hotel is not conveniently located for night life.
I booked through booking.com and paid about £75 for 2 nights with breakfast.
title: Right side of Jakarta if doing Krakatau

text:
Good business hotel for an overnight stay. Location is a bit far from the airport but not terrible. Nice hotel with comfortable rooms for 1 or 2 nights. 
What really made the difference is the Parisian cafe and the staff there. Especially wanted to mention Sandro as he went out of his way to make it a fun and memorable dinner which we truly treasured as it was our last meal in Dubai. 
The food was also excellent and very tasty and delicious.
Would definitely recommend for an overnight stay and definitely recommend eating in the restaurant!
title: Overnight stay - wonderful restaurant

text: I stayed here and found the rooms were small and the windows were dirty. Our shower drain got clogged and the door is too high so the water flows right under it.  When we went down for dinner, the waiters continued to walk straight past us. The food was good but extremely overpriced and when we ordered two bowls of ice cream they brought us two scoops in one bowl. Plus the waiters and workers barely speak any English, the only thing I liked were the pool and the gym. The worst part is how it is supposed to be an airport hotel but it took us half an hour to get to the hotel. I would say try to avoid staying here.
title: Avoid at all costs!

text:
I was led to believe that this hotel is close to the airport, but for some reason the main road to the airport is closed so it takes more than 30 minutes to get there.

Otherwise, it is nice and friendly hotel with decent restaurant but it does not serve beer.

I recommend it for people arriving late or travelling early morning.
title: Friendly and nice but not so close to the airport

text:
Allium hotel is a pleasant place good to have rest after a long flight. Located close to the airport (10 minute by car) Allium hotel is clean and comfortable.

The hotel is quite new, rooms are large with a great view on Jakarta. Breakfast is served in a cool restaurant, food is very good with a large variety of hot and cold courses.

You can arrange the pick up service to and from the hotel.

I suggest you to book the business package wich, for less the 5 euro more than a normal room, includes the pick up service and larger rooms.

Distance from the airport is more ore less 15/20 minutes. Consider that jakarta airport is very very wide!
title: Perfect after a long flight

text:
I just recently happened to stay in this lovely supermodern und all new 4-star-hotel near the airport and I enjoyed it very much!!! 

It is officially called an "airport hotel" but the drive is still some 20 mins away from the airport as such, which, in turn, is also due to some oneway roads there which don't allow early U-turns. 
However, I had known about this fact already and didn't pay too much attention to it. Even more so, I decided to book it and therefore neglect other hotels in the closer vicinity. I do like the website which matches absolutely with what I have found: lovely contemporary architecture, a supermodern light-flooded lobby and- most of all - extremely friendly and helpful as well as polite hotel staff who had an excellent command of English!!!!  The rooms are modernly decorated without any unnecessary niffnaff and especially my room was very bright as it had a wide window front. The bed was a little too soft to my personal liking, but then again, it can't meet everybody' s personal preference. After all, I had even found more of a coma than a sound sleep after a tiring 20-hour-journey - so no complaints there at all! 

Basically I had chosen this hotel for an intermediate stop from Europe before I would continue on a domestic flight, Also, I had booked it as I liked the design, the vicinity and the price for a single night there. It all matched completely my aspirations!! All facilties inside the room were properly functioning, so no complaints there either! 

I even managed to receive a late check out for the following afternoon! I didn't try any of the restaurants or swimming pool facilities though even though I had initially wanted to (but sleep was too sound...-)..)

I would surely recommend this lovely hotel to anyone looking for a break from a tiring flight! 

A big Thank you to all the staff who made this a pleasant stay for me!! Definetely, I would book this hotel again, should the situation arise!
title: Perfect stay

text:
Allium hotel is a good 4 star hotel 
Nice comfortable rooms good breakast and professional staff.really nice lobby and the staff arranged free airport transfer.free wifi is also very good

The only real negative is the location it takes 20 minutes to get there from the airport.
title: claims to be an airport hotel but is 20 minutes drive from the airport

title: One day in Jakarta

text:
We stayed in this hotel for one night. 

We got a complimentary airport shuttle both to and from the airport which was great. The hotel is about a 20-25 minute drive from the airport in no traffic. 

We were really impressed with this hotel. Check in was very prompt and we got a welcome drink upon arrival! The lobby is very impressive as is the service from all the staff. They can't do enough for you, giving us late check out free of charge which is very handy if you are hanging around the hotel for a flight. 

The room itself was very spacious, modern and clean. We paid US$50 for a double room including breakfast. There was a fridge in the room, tea making facilities, cable TV, AC and hot water. 

The breakfast is a buffet style with so much lovely fresh food. You can ask the waiters for eggs and any type of egg will be prepared for you. 

One little disappointment with the hotel was the swimming pool, it wasn't great but was no big deal. 

Would definitely recommend this hotel!
title: Brilliant Hotel

text:
A brand new hotel that was just opened early this year. Overall, good services, clean room, good food with good prices and excellent helpful staffs.

The handicap is most taxi drivers did not well the location of this hotel even though it is not far from airport and the hotel is only minutes from Poris Bus terminal. We need to bring the map of hotel location and give to the taxi driver and take a Blue Bird taxi as a reputable taxi company here from the airport.
title: Super new hotel even though still not popular!

text:
Nothing wrong with this hotel, clean, very affordable with excellent and helpful staff, but an airport hotel it is not. It is some distance from the airport by road and the traffic at anytime of the night or day is somewhat problematic! 
We had some issues getting a non smoking room, as in never having been smoked in, however this too was sorted by a free upgrade, so folks keep your paperwork!
title: Airport Hotel ?

text: If you look to stay close to the airport, this is the perfect hotel for you. The rooms aremodern,  comfortable & very clean. The staff very friendly and helpful. Airport pick up was a real plus and Pak Dede helped my to retrieve my lost luggage that could not be delivered when dropping me off again. Great stay!
title: great value

text:
The good:

I stayed for two nights May 23-25 and I chose this hotel due to its good ratings on service and value. I used their complimentary airport transfer service even though I arrived later than expected due to flight delays; I was to meet their driver at 11:00 PM but didn't clear immigration and customs until 11:25 PM. I exited the arrivals area looking to take a taxi, and to my surprise, I found their driver waiting for me holding a sign with my name!

Hotel is located about 10 KM south of the airport and it takes about 25-30 minutes to get there without traffic(very early morning or late at night) and their complimentary airport shuttle service is available from 7AM - 11PM, so plan accordingly.

A deposit (500,000 IDR) is required upon check-in, and cash or credit card are accepted. Facilities are very modern and clean. Rooms have most needed amenities, and the bed was quite comfortable. All their employees are very courteous and friendly and the food at the restaurant is fairly good in my opinion.
 
The bad: The rooms are not sound-proofed, I had a room facing the street, with a glass window and a pointless door to a patio or terrace that was locked; you could hear traffic noise all day long. You can hear a lot of noise coming from the hall, specially on weekend nights when everyone comes back in late from the bar, chatting and slamming their room doors.

The location is a bit inconvenient, no restaurants in sight and for those who want to explore the city, there is a train and a bus station 700 meters away, but unless you speak or read Indonesian, you'll have a hard time navigating their transportation system  and it will take you around 1.5 to 2+ hours to reach the city center. Taxis are an option, but be aware, traffic is horrendous and you must pay road tolls.  

In short, If you you need a place to stay near the airport that is clean, modern, with good service and offers good you a good value, this place is a very good choice. For travelers with longer stays or on holiday, you might consider something more centric.
title: Good service, great value, but not perfect for tourist travelers.

text:
I was here in Jakarta with my bf and friends for a music festival. We stayed in this hotel for all 3 days. 

The staff here are really friendly! From the security at the guardhouse, to lobby entrance, restaurant/cafe, concierge, the staff makes sure that guests feel welcomed. Staff can speak good English too which is definitely a plus point! 

I needed to have my bottle of wine opened. Even though they don't serve alcohol in this hotel, the staff still did their best to open the bottle for me.

Food for room service was great (esp the carbonara) and totally affordable! However the breakfast at Paris-Lyon cafe can be improved. If the hotel can prepare more Indonesian local cuisine (other than just fried rice and noodles) that would be great! 

Overall, the staff is extremely helpful and do their best to fulfill guests' request. I highly recommend this hotel! :)
title: Friendly and professional staff, great service

text:
This is a very good option for travelers who have to catch an early flight at CGK. It is located close to the Batu Ceper Airport Railink station (20' walk or 5' taxi). There were some eateries around, but they weren't anything special.
The room itself is quite good, although I had expected a bathtub in a **** hotel. the amenities were very basic (no razor) and the towels weren't completely white. I had a room that opens to a big open terrace, but I couldn't open the glass door or window. the lobby was spacious, and staff was super friendly and helpful. They helped me print out the Railink ticket that I bought online. The breakfast was amazingly good, with many items. If I hadn't had to catch an early flight, I would have spent an hour there.

The overall experience was very pleasant.
title: A nice hotel for an early flight

We stayed at the hotel for a business meeting for 3 days. My room even got upgraded. There was an appropriate smoking room near the meeting room (that was in the second floor) called The Havana Room. We don't even need to got out of the hotel. It was really convenient. 

The service was astounding and the facilities are accommodating. We also had to perform the Friday prayers but, it was raining and they quickly took an initiative to accommodate us in the ballroom. 

The food was decent enough. The rooms were excellent and worth the money that you spent. The hotel interior, especially the lobby's ceiling, was quite "instagrammable" if you're interested in taking pictures. 

The attention given by the hotel staff to the guests was beyond our expectation. They carefully thought out every little detail to serve the comfort of their guests. We don't even need to think, they did it for us.

text:
Good hotel to stay. Just not special
This is my 4th stay in this hotel. Before, we always stay in a hurry cause of business. So this time we tried to do holiday here.
Too bad that just now we found out that the pool is not good enough for family. The pool is not big, not enough chair/desk to put things (only enough for about 2 people/family), and worse is the weird access to the pool that have to be from front hotel (dont know why they block the side access).
No welcome drink either
And the parking space is small (though usually enough).

Other than that, the room is good enough and the staff is friendly enough. The food is okay too.

So if u only needed hotel to stay, allium is a good enough choice. But if u want to do holiday especially with kids that love to swim in the pool, sorry to say that this is not a good hotel to do that

text: I stayed almost three weeks at the Alium and enjoyed my stay there very much.Location from the airport is good and with the provided shuttle service, even more nice. Of course that Indonesian traffic is crowdy and detours on the roads are also common, so expect some delay sometimes.The hotel itself has nice and neat rooms. Superb wifi and relaxing beds.Breakfast was local and international and you always will find something you like to eat. On two days I had to skip brealfast coz there was also a convention at the hotel and those guest were so many at the breakfast buffet too that I could not find a free seat to sit and eat. Maybe the hotel should have the people from conventions seperated from the 'normal' guests.One thing the hotel can improve in their next investments is the pool and the fitness room. Both are rather small and not nice to get to. You relally had to leave the front door of the hotel to get there, That should really be improved.
title: Good and relaxed hotel

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Stayed at a couple of hotels around Tangerang area including Mercure & Novotel and I find that Allium is only average in terms of the room quality. 

Things to look out for 

Although it is clean but it is not as good as the other two hotels I have stayed in. The swimming pool and gym is also only average. There is no sauna and steam bath facility. There is no shampoo and bathing gel. You have to get all these at the nearby supermarket - Alpha Mart. 

In fact, when I wanted to get an electronic weighing scale, I called the receptionist and they said they have it. So I went all the way down to the Gym and then they told me it is not working. It would be better if the receptionist told me that it was not working and then I don’t need to go down.

The good

There is free airport shuttle from and to the airport. The driver is patient, friendly and helpful. 

Breakfast is good. There are a lot of counters and variety for us to choose from. Including stations that offer bakso mee, gado gado, fried tempe nuggets. But dessert is not nice, please don’t waste your stomach space by having the dounuts and bagels.

Room is clean and comfortable although very small in comparison to the other hotels I have stayed in. They provide ironing service at $2.50 per dress. 

It is very affordable at $60 plus including daily breakfast.
title: Simple & Affordable BUT...

text: Cozy place, quiet and clean. only half hour to airport, 5 minutes to mall. the breakfast is really great, wide variety to choose,.. friendly and helpful staff,  but too bad access to pool relatively wide open,..
title: you should try

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text: It was definitely an average hotel stay. The front desk design and front interior really blew me away despite the condition of the surrounding buildings. Apart from that, it was pretty ordinary for a hotel at that price range. The room was very nice and clean with a good view, however, the bathroom really disappointed me with no tub and only a simple shower-head. It was such a spacious bathroom with only the basics that you had the feeling that it was missing something, almost as if you felt like they have yet to finish the construction of the bathroom and they just opened it to begin bringing in profit. I am not sure if that was just specific to my room, but I do not base my hotel reviews on just the bathroom. Overall, the stay was very suitable for my needs and I would recommend it to anyone looking to stay away from the city buzz and the airport commotion. (Please note if you plan on going anywhere outside of the hotel, apart from the free shuttle that they provide to and from the airport, I HIGHLY recommend you take a scooter in order to avoid being stuck in traffic for hours like myself in a car)
title: Perfect Hotel between the airport and city without the traffic surrounding it

text:
This was my first stay in Allium Tangerang. The hotel was beautifully designed. Looked strong and tall.

But one thing I will never forget is their garang asem. It was so tasty and made me order twice for room service and a la carte.
I would love to come back for another taste one day.

text: I stayed at this hotel while a solo traveler - flew in from the US and had an overnight stay before heading to Bali. Hotel was clean and comfortable and all the staff were very nice. Had a small gym and breakfast was included, so everything I was looking for during a brief stay. It took about 45mins to transfer to/from the airport, even though it looks close on the map so take this into account.
title: Great for international stopover

text:
Had an event in Novotel Tangerang last Sunday, Novotel were fully booked so decided to choose other more or less similar star hotel. This hotel name is sounding glamorous so I chose it. Unluckily was not as expected. Despite it was quite high in price, this hotel need lots to improve. The room is standard with nothing showing 4 stars design. The luggage table positioning just wrong and the working table was so small so it had limited space if you wanted to put your belongings. What worst was the breakfast. I stayed 2 nights, 1st day tasted Nasi Goreng Kampung, Bihun Goreng and Soup. Tried those 3 and touched nothing else, 2nd day I skipped the breakfast because taste awful. Plates and cups so dirty with dusts.
But at least there were good side of this hotel: the pillow and bed were not too bad, aircon was cool but hot water not hot enough. Staff were so friendly.

Sorry to say I would try another hotel when I have similar event or business trip in Tangerang.
title: Need lots to improve for 4 stars hotel

The room was good, the only thing that needs to be improved is about internet speed, but its does not matter for me, as long as the internet is connected to my device. They have pool, fitness center, and spa.
They also have for Airport Shuttle which is so helpful, but you should make the reservation min one day before to arrange the shuttle, From Airport to reach this hotel it takes 45 min or one hour approx. 
but no worries because this hotel is near to the station where you can get the Airport Train to go to the airport and its only takes 30 min approx.

text:
Never thought that in Tangerang area there is a good hotel. The service is very good, the hotel is very comfortable, the architecture and the interior are very beautiful.

I really like the shape of a circular lobby. Feels spacious with high ceilings. The lighting also feels very different because it uses sunlight. An environmentally friendly and energy-efficient hotel.

For my room I occupy a Deluxe Executive Room that can fit 3 people. Does not feel cramped even though occupied by 3 adults.

The breakfast menu here is quite diverse with local, asian and western menus.

I highly recommend this hotel, for transit from airport, business trip or family holiday

text:
I chose this hotel because it isn't far to the airport ... only 30/40 minutes. I used their shuttle for my pick up and also for my retorn.
The hotel is really beautiful: a big and suggestive hall, a large and comfortable room and a good restaurant with also out door side for smokers.
The staff is really careful and polite.
There is also a comfortable pool with sunbeds and a very well equipped gym.
Every space is very clean and neat.
Breakfast  is the most inclusive ever found in hotels ... desserts, fruit, jouces, indonesian food, western food, japanise sushi ... !!!
Every thing was been perfect for me. Unfortunately that I was ony day only ... pity !!!
A special thanks to Mr Johnson that has accepted all my requestes.
And greetings to the friendly driver Mr Martin.
I raccommend this Hotel to anyone who was in jakarta for trip or holliday.

title: CHEATING ON ME!!!

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Anton,

Warmest greetings from Allium Tangerang Hotel.

Thank you for taking the time to share your experience on TripAdvisor.

First of all, we would like to convey our most sincerest apologies for the unpleasant experience that you encountered during your stay with us. Please allow us to explain regarding your booking for the Executive Deluxe Twin Bed and its difference with the Executive Deluxe King Bed. Both rooms have the same price, but do differ in size. Should you have been accommodated at the Executive Deluxe King Bed, the booking would have required additional charge for an extra bed, we do agree that this should have been communicated to you by our staff. While there are no other room category with queen plus single beds. We thank you for your feedback and have rectified the information in our hotel confirmation letters.  

We have taken serious note of your comments and would like to assure you that a similar occurrence will not happen again. We apologize once more for the inconvenience and thank you for notifying us of the situation which has been very valuable to us in improving the quality of our service. 

We do hope that this does not deter you from returning to Allium Tangerang Hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back.


Yours sincerely,
Pria Kunta Biswara 
General Manager

text: Airport pick up did not arrive after waiting 30 minutes we called hotel who failed to understand any English so hung up on us repeatedly, airport staff stepped in after our 4th phone call to translate which was pointless as hotel didnt know where driver was so hung up again. 2 hrs of waiting and trying to find a taxi driver who knew where this Hotel was later, we arrived. This Hotel is not near the Airport at all ... it took us exactly 35 mins and then around 30mins to airport at 6am with no traffic. Hotel is beautiful .. rooms are spacious as well as clean. text: The Allium is a great hotel with fantastic staff.  Every e-mail was responded to within minutes.  The shuttle driver met us at the airport right at the agreed time.  Breakfast was great.  I will definitely stay ay this hotel again.

text:
It is not near to airport at all.
But the good things they will pick up and drop the customers from airport to hotel and vice versa (follow hotel's schedule).
You can't find any alcohol drinks there because the local govt. has given the rules :(
Can't find nice places to see around, just crowded road, the pool is small and outside near parking cars!
The staff are helpful, place is clean and quite, you can see many planes are flying from far away airport, so you won't hear any noisy .
title: Wonder why it is called Airport Hotel?

text: Professional and client-friendly hotel. Quick personal help and feedback and everything seems very well arranged. Very assertive in offering help and service and giving the feeling everything will be perfectly taken care of.
title: Professional and client friendly hotel

text:
I stayed at the Allium in February 2014 2 times for a couple of days each. It's really a nice hotel in terms of the building itself, it's brand new and is very clean and for the price you have to pay, it's really great value. The buffet was very good with a good variety of choices, plus the staff are really professional and nice - it's as though you are in a 5 star hotel.

There are a few things to consider though; there isn't much to do within the area, and public transport can be a problem when in Jakarta - just based on personal experience, the taxis can cheat you if you are a foreigner. Well, the first time I booked, there was a small miscommunication with the transport, I didn't find the driver, not really his fault - it's total miscommunication. At that time, the taxis didn't know about the hotel (but I think that's being sorted out now) - and I ended up paying about US$ 40 to a taxi driver who seemed to have taken the longest route ever to get to the hotel.

But otherwise, I love this hotel really!
title: Promising New Hotel

text:
Stayed for 2 nights from May 21-23 and selected this hotel due to proximity to Airport. Good and bad points are highlighted below:

GOOD:

Nice welcome at hotel with a refreshing drink. Facilities are new and room, while small, has everything one needs including a small fridge, safe, bathroom slippers, etc.  Wi-Fi and breakfast are included in the rate which represents good value for money.  Gym, while small, is new and has 2 treadmills, 1 bike, 1 elliptical trainer, a couple of machines for arms and legs and some free weights.

BAD:

No alcohol at the hotel.  Lot's of "teething pain" (A/C stopped working after 30 mins!) since hotel has only been open for 5 months.  Some of the staff's level of English is quite poor. Inaccurate room service menu.  Room service took 45 mins for spaghetti and it was not per description in room service menu; ended up taking 1 to get pasta. Portion was also very small.  Location is hard to find. In my opinion, this hotel is not geared for western business travelers.
title: Has Potential

text: 45 minutes away from airport so name a little misleading. The traffic is always heavy in this city. Taxi drivers and tour guide hadn’t heard of it or knew the address. However, it’s quite new and fresh with polite staff and comfortable beds and room and is priced well. The breakfast is average but acceptable. If you like a drink, this is not the place for you. It is, in my view, a one night stop-over hotel and not a base for a Jakarta stay.
title: Quite new, clean with polite staff

Great hotel, but it is surely not an airport hotel. And that is made worse because Jakarta has the worst traffic I have ever experienced in my life. That said, the hotel looks very good, quite a different style to the usual. Food selection is very limited and tastes ok. Do no opt for the take away breakfast - it is a far cry from what one can have while sitting in.

Overall, I think it can do better. Much better without having to spend much. There is also no sound proofing in the rooms, so you can hear all the trains, mosques and traffic.
title: Definitely NOT an Airport Hotel, the name is misleading

text: Very nice place. The staff are great and the rooms very clean. Recommend to everybody. Appears to be close to everything I need and the staff can put you in touch with all the services you would need whilst staying on Jakarta. Food is of the highest quality.
title: Very nice place to stay

text: We needed to be near the airport for a flight at 04.50 so chose this because reviews of others were so bad. We tried to book the free airport transfer but were told it was only available on the hour and we arrived a bit late to wait.  However we were in the baggage hall and a very polite man arrived with our name on a board anyway!  At the hotel an equally polite young woman checked and confirmed our booking on her system but insisted on having our voucher. We explained we are travelling with tablet computer only and cannot open let alone print vouchers.  Even so she insisted and we had to log in and show her the email before she would complete check in.  We then asked to pay in full in cash up front because of our 02.00 check out. We then had to wait for house keeping to empty the minibar so we couldn't use anything!  All that said we got to our room on 10th floor and it was great.  The hotel is less than a year old and well appointed and exceptionally clean.  Crisp white cotton sheets and better pillows than I have ever had in a hotel.  In room tea facilities, safe, tv with international channels, minibar (!) and lovely bathroom.  We had a swim in the pool which felt a bit like it was in the car park, then a really good dinner in the restaurant. Due to the early check out they made us a breakfast box with 3 croissant like pastries each and a take away tea.  They are very keen to please. What a shame we couldn't stay a full night!  Just 20 minutes from the airport in the middle of the night.
title: really good - but a little weird in some ways

text: Knowing  that we had hours of delay, and that the last shuttlebus to the hotel was at 23h15 we expected to have to search for a taxi. We were exhousted after 27 hours of journey, we arrived at 1h30 .....and to our great surprise we found a nice man at the deserted luggage place with a sign with our name on it. He had been waiting for over 4 hours to pick us up. We allmost fell into his arms. All employes were very hellpfull, the beds and rooms and breakfast were exellent, they deserve a recommandation.
title: surprise!

text: We stayed at this hotel for close access to the airport. We were pleasantly surprised by the clean and new facilities, with all staff bending over backwards to be helpful and friendly. The room was clean and the included breakfast very good. The bar does not serve alcohol, but guests may indulge in their rooms. The kitchen is halal and of course no pork products. The pool is clean but sparse, the exercise room is adequate, but all new and not quite finished at time of writing. We have booked there again for another connecting flight later in the year.
title: Fine Hotel with Close Airport Access

text:
We found this hotel near the airport and booked into this hotel at the last minute when our flight was cancelled on 14 Feb for a night's stay.  It was brand new and located just 20 mins from the airport.  The rooms are basic but still spacious and comfortable.  

Staffs are very friendly and helpful.  

Although situated near the airport, we noticed that the surrounding areas/road leading to the hotel are just padi fields and small village shops.  

But if you are looking for a hotel with easy access to the airport which is clean, friendly and affordable, then this is a good hotel to go to.
title: Friendly and value for money hotel near airport

text:
Het hotel ligt in de voorstad van Jakarta. Helaas in de spits op ruim een uur van het vliegveld. Buiten de spits er ongeveer 40 minuten over gedaan.
De kamers zijn ruim en schoon. Ontbijt is prima. 
Restaurant heeft uitgebreide kaart maar veel is "sold uit" als je het besteld. Geen alcohol verkrijgbaar.
Receptie vriendelijk en snel.
title: Mooi hotel

text:
Hotel considerato vicino all'aeroporto internazionale soekarno hatta ma così vicino non è
La struttura presenta svariati punti a favore come la precisione, la pulizia, l'ampiezza della camera e alcuni a sfavore come il servizio navetta aeroportuale, il ristorante, il prezzo
Rapporto qualità prezzo scarsamente soddisfacente
title: Poco soddisfatta

text:
优点：
1.酒店四星，价格非常非常的值，吸烟房干净整洁没有异味，落地窗擦得透亮。
2.早餐就在楼下cafe，餐品兼顾多国口味，可惜没有机会尝试正餐。
3.前台、餐厅、司机、行李小哥都非常的有礼貌，结束对话会行合十礼，语言周到有耐心。
缺点：
1.位置离机场较远（20km以上），尤其路况一般，所以接驳巴士需要一个小时才能到。注意T3接机点在出发大厅层（2nd floor）
2.（不能算作缺点的缺点）房间全封闭没有阳台，如果对阳台有要求，可能需要咨询酒店后再决定。
总结：非常遗憾没有尝试你们的健身房和泳池。如果中转时间足够，或停留雅加达游玩，该酒店是我个人住宿首选
title: 从邮件沟通到实际入住都非常令人愉悦放心，时间宽裕下我的首选

text:
We hebben hier oud en nieuw gevierd tijdens onze tussenstop in Jakarta van 31 december 2016 tot 2 januari 2017 en op de terugweg van 17 op 18 januari 2017. Je wordt hier echt in de watten gelegd. Vooral de gratis airport shuttle was erg plezierig(20 km). Men heeft er werkelijk alles aan gedaan om het ons naar het zin te maken. Tevens heeft dit fijne hotel een heerlijk zwembad. De prijs kwaliteit verhouding is verrassend.
Bij de volgende Indonesië reis zullen wij hier zeker terugkeren!
title: Heerlijk hotel voor een tussenstop in Jakarta

text:
J'ai séjourné à cette hotel en 2014 à l'ouverture, c'était impeccable sur toute la ligne.
Octobre 2016 j'y suis retourné, la déception fut grande, mur et tapis  des couloirs salle ascenseur fonctionnait mal, ouverture magnétique de la chambre fonctionnait mal. Enfin service de navette ou l'aéroport (AUCUN LA NUIT JUSQU'A 7 AM ) petit déjeuner qui était fantastique est devenu ordinaire. Mais le personnel est toujours aimable.

Donc le management est déficient .
title: Hotel qui vieillit rapidement  et au service de navette déficient

text: 공항에 가까운 호텔인데 딱히 그렇게 가깝지도 않고 애매합니다 .. 시설은 뭐 나쁘지 않습니다 특히 부페는 상당히 좋은편
title: 출장용 공항인접

Personeel is erg vriendelijk en behulpzaam.

text:
Abbiamo soggiornato una sola notte in questo hotel: la struttura è noderna, pulita, insomma davver un bellissimo hotel.
Ma c'è un "ma": l'hotel non è affatto vicino all'aeroporto, alla sera senza traffico ci abbiamo messo 45 minuti con la loro navetta. E sempre a proposito di navetta, ci avevano chiesto di comunicare l'orario dei nostri voli sia in arrivo che in partenza.... ma dopo aver scritto la mail abbiamo ricevuto la risposta con parecchio ritardo, comunicandoci il punto di ritrovo all'arrivo, ma non ci hanno informato che l'ultima navetta per l'aeroporto parte inderogabilmente alle 14.00. Poichè il nostro volo internazionale partiva alle 20.30 siamo stati costretti a prendere e pagare un taxi, perchè non abbiamo potuto usufruire della loro navetta gratuita!
Inoltre la piscina era in manutenzione e non abbiamo potuto usarla, anche se era uno dei motivi per cui avevamo scelto questo hotel!
title: Mi aspettavo meglio

text:
翌日の飛行機が早かったので、こちらのホテルを選びました。
エアポートホテルにしては遠いと思いました。車で30分くらい。

でも、ホテルは快適です。
スタッフの方々は親切で感じも良し。
部屋もキレイです。
アメニティのシャンプー、リンス、ボディソープが同じなのは気になりましたが…

夜の軽食でレストランを利用したのですが、サラダとピザをオーダーして出てくるまでに1時間かかりました。少し遅い時間だったせいかもしれませんが、待たせすぎでは？？

でも、総合的に嫌な思いはしませんでした。
また利用すると思います。
title: キレイなホテルで快適でしたが問題もあり！

text:
Abbiam scelto questo hotel prenotando su booking per tre motivi:
1. 12 km dall'aeroporto.non é vero! Alla sera, senza traffico ci abbiam messo 45 minuti!
2. Navetta gratuita da e per l'aeroporto ad orari prestabiliti. Dicono di mandare una mail con gli orari dei voli. Bene le abbiam mandate (3) e loro ci han risposto solo a una e ci hanno dato info solo per il pick up in aeroporto. Non hanno mai riportato gli orari del dropp off invece, e l'ultimo é alle 14. Noi avevamo il volo intercontinentale per l'Italia (con lo scalo quasi 20 ore in tutto) alle ore 20.30 ed era impensabile andare in aeroporto tanto prima quindi abbiam dovuto pagarci il taxi.
3. La piscina che avevamo intenzione di usare per rilassarci era sotto manutenzione e non utilizzabile e ovviamente non ce l'hanno comunicato. 
Per tutti questi problemi non ci hanno fatto nessun sconto ma pretendevano ancora il pagamento del late check out. Per fortuna, dopo aver esposto i problemi di cui sopra ci hanno lasciato la camera gratis fino alle 16.
L'hotel é moderno,bello, pulito e profumato e la colazione abbondante e varia ma ci sono molti hotel vicino all'aeroporto (tipo quello dove abbiam trascorso la prima notte) che offrono le stesse cose e a prezzi molto più bassi. E son davvero vicino all'aeroporto!
title: Le informazioni su booking non sono corrette e loro hanno omesso troppo

text: Se dovete passare una notte a jakarta questo hotel è perfetto. Camere grandi e pulite, colazione internazionale per tutte le culture a buffet (troverete caffè, frutta, uova, dumpling e molto altro), piscina, personale disponibile e un servizio navetta da/per l'aeroporto. Intorno all'hotel non c'è praticamente niente. Dovrete prendere un taxi per raggiungere la città, ma se siete solo di passaggio consiglio anche il ristorante interno con piatti italiani (ho provato la pasta ed è buona) e piatti tipici. L'hotel dista pochi km ma attenzione al traffico, calcolate circa 45 minuti per raggiungerlo.
title: Perfect!

text:
Wir haben wie viele hier nur einen Zwischenstopp für eine Nacht in dem Hotel gemacht und haben nichts zu beanstanden. Wir hatten unser Zimmer auf der Seite, wo der Zug nicht zu hören ist von daher kann ich über den Geräuschpegel nichts sagen.
Der Shuttle Service hat uns zur abgemachten Zeit am Flughafen CGK abgeholt und direkt ins Hotel gebracht. 
Das gesamte Personal, war sehr nett, freundlich und hilfsbereit. 
Unser Zimmer war sauber und alles hat funktioniert, wie es sein soll. Das Wi-Fi ging auch völlig in Ordnung.
Da es in der näheren Umgebung eigentlich nichts zu sehen oder zu Essen gibt, haben wir im Hotel gegessen und können uns auch hier über nichts beschweren. Es hat zwar ca 15 Minuten länger gedauert als angegeben bis das Essen kam aber dafür war es lecker. Auch das Frühstück, war vollkommen in Ordnung.
Als Fazit können wir nur sagen, das man für eine Nacht auf jeden Fall hier residieren kann.
title: Wir hatten nichts zu bemängeln

text: Hotellet blev brugt til en enkelt overnatning ved mellemlanding. Højt serviceniveau! Vi blev hentet og bragt til lufthavnen. Hotellet havde fast afgange til lufthavnen, men de var fleksible iht afgange. Morgenmaden var lækker, alt hvad hjertet kan begære i både det asiatiske og kontinentale køkken. Hotellet var flot og i fin stand. Det kan klart anbefales.
title: Nemt og lækkert

text:
Wir haben das Flughafenhotel, sollte man es so nennen können, aufgrund eines eintägigen Zwischenstopps in Jakarta gebucht. 

Der Hinweg, wenn auch nur wenige Luftkilometer entfernt, dauerte eine knappe Stunde. Im Hotel wurden wir freundlich empfangen und erhielten ein angebliches Upgrade. Freudig auf das Zimmer waren wir jedoch erstaunt, dass selbst das angeblich upgegradete Zimmer sehr klein und nicht einladend war. Im Bad gab es nicht einmal ein kleines Duschgel Fläschchen, in der Zimmerbrochüre über das Hotel haben angezeigte Seiten gefehlt z.B. Über das Angebot im Zimmer zu essen. Um das Hotel ist weit und breit nichts einladenden, vor den Zimmern nur eine laute und stark frequentierte Bahnlinie sowie eine Hauptstraße. 

Das Angebot des Restaurants bis 22:30 Uhr zu Essen wollten wir nutzen, da es wie gesagt Nahe drumherum nichts gibt. Der Kellner kam nach 20 Minuten Handy getippe und Privatgesprächen nach einer etwas genervten Aufforderung unsererseits dann auch mal zum Tisch, dass bestellte essen (Pizza) gab es dann nicht - aber die Nummer vom Pizza Hut Lieferservice. Also haben wir etwas anderes bestellt, aber da selbst die Getränke nach weiteren 15 Minuten noch nicht fertig waren und das Restaurant voller Moskitos war, haben wir darum gebeten das Essen dann ins Zimmer bringen zu lassen. Die hochpreisigen Speisen waren dann teilweise auch kalt bis sie oben angekommen sind und wurden nach einer Beschwerde nochmal Mikrowellenfrisch und trocken an unser Zimmer gebracht. 

Das WLAN brach auch ständig ab und das Gym verfügt nicht einmal über Gewichtshanteln.
title: Selbst für eine Nacht keine Option

punti negativi: il wifi non prendeva bene nella stanza. dovevo scendere nella hall però è un dettaglio. prende benissimo anche in piscina e al ristorante che forse è un tantino caro ma cucina benissimo. piccolezze. l hotel è ok!

text: Como jakarta no es una ciudad muy interesante y tiene mucho trafico, elegir una zona cerca del aereopuerto para pasar una noche antes de coger el vuelo puede ser una buena opcion.la habitacion y el hotel es bueno y tiene shuttle gratis pero se lo tienes q pedir y dejarlo bien claro.personal dedicado,el desayuno bueno la piscina muy pequeña.lo malo esta en un lugar apartado.para unas horas esta bien por el precio.
title: Un hotel de calidad y buen precio a 30 min del aereopuerto

text: El desayuno una pasada, un buffet excelente en plan comida más que desayuno. Las habitaciones, baño e instalaciones de un cuatro estrellas europeo, lo que le da una buena calidad precio. Ofrecen servicio de recogida y traslado al aeropuerto gratis que es real pero con limitaciones graves. Tuvimos la mala suerte de que nuestro vuelo llegó con retraso de una hora y aunque tenían todos los datos del vuelo para conocer el retraso y cuando llegábamos, al salir nadie estaba esperando. Llamamos al hotel y de forma nada agradable nos dijeron que esperásemos que pasarían a buscarnos, pero al cabo de una hora nadie había aparecido. Nueva llamada, misma respuesta y espera de otros 15 minutos hasta que llegaron.
title: Buen hotel con traslado al aeropuerto malo

Zimmer sind ok, sauber und recht gepflegt, allerdings sehr laut, sowohl die Hauptstraße als auch die Bahnlinie waren extrem laut, ebenso die Klimaanlage im Zimmer. Check-in/-out war freundlich und schnell. Transfer vom Flughafen hat zwar funktioniert, allerdings mußten wir noch eine halbe Stunde auf andere Gäste warten.

text:
Nous avons passé une nuit à l'Allium Airport Hotel avant de prendre l'avion. La chambre était confortable, la salle de bain fonctionnel avec une douche spacieuse et tout le nécessaire de toilette (gel douche, shampoing, brosse à dent, dentifrice...) et un séche cheveux. 
Bouilloire, café, thé et deux petites bouteilles sont dans la chambre.
Le buffet du petit déjeuner varié salés et sucré. 
Nous avons bénéficié du service de navette proposé par l'hotel depuis l'aéroport, le trajet a été très long (+1h) en raison de la circulation. Mieux vaut prévoir large lorsqu'on a un avion à prendre!
A savoir que le service de navettes gratuites hotel/aéroport s'arrête à 13h30, après il nous revient de payer le trajet (200000rp).
Les prix au bar sont effrayants par exemple 30000 rp la petite bouteille d'eau. Il y en a 2 gratuite dans la.chambre.
Les chambres, bien que confortable, sont assez bruyantes (train, circulation, klaxon).
title: Agréable mais un peu bruyant.

text:
Wir waren eine Nacht vor unserem Abflug im Allium Airport Hotel. 
Der CheckIn ging recht flott und die Rezeptionisten wusste gleich, wer wir sind. Der Airport-Transfer war schon reserviert und wurde bestätigt. 

Das Zimmer war super, mit einem tollen Blick. Das Hotel könnte von der Einrichtung und vom Look & Feel auch in Europa stehen. 
Einziges "Hinderniss": eine Steckdose zu finden, die für den Wasserkocher erreichbar ist. 

Das Frühstück hat uns enttäuscht. Es gab nur Toast, zur Deko allerdings tolles Brot. Sonst für "Western Style" fast nur Süßes, auch das Bircher war sehr, sehr süß. Auf Anfrage habe ich eine kleine Schale (naja, eine Espressotasse) ungesüßtes Bircher bekommen. 
Das Nasi und die gebratenen Nudeln haben uns nach vier Wochen Indonesien nicht so wirklich geschmeckt, maximal Durchschnitt. 

Die Lage des Hotels ist ein bisschen ab vom Schuss, der Taxifahrer (aus der Stadt) musste ein paar Mal fragen, wo es ist. Das Taxi vom Gambir Bahnhof in Jakarta hat 150.000 gekostet. 

Der Transfer zum Airport dauert ca 40 Minuten, ganz nah ist es also nicht. Hat aber gut geklappt.
title: Schönes Hotel / Frühstück lala

text:
El hotel está nuevo, habitaciones cómodas y espaciosas. Dispone de lanzadera desde y hacia el aeropuerto sin ningún coste, pero debes informarte antes vía email con el hotel, que tiene una excelente atención al cliente y te responde enseguida.
El día de salida nos ibamos antes del horario del desayuno y previa petición nos prepararon desayuno para llevar (café y unos bollos). 
Cené en el propio restaurante del hotel, correcto, nada más.
En los alrededores no me pareció que hubiera restaurantes. 
Tened en cuenta que en Jakarta se forman unos grandes atascos, por lo que controlad el horario y salid con mucho tiempo para ir/volver hacia el aeropuerto. De hecho el hotel está cercano, pero por los atascos de la mañana pueden ser 45-60 min perfectamente.
Junio 2014
title: Muy recomendable, buena atención al cliente y buena calidad-precio
